companies.name: Arpa's Organics
companies.coverDescription: A registered MSME for Urban Agriculture
companies.fullDescription:
Our features:-

  • Training and consulting packages
  • Home Gardening
  • Terrace Gardening
  • Farming
  • Horticulture
  • Hydroponics
  • Aquaponics
  • Aeroponics & Bioflocks

We help you with :-

Garden kit for beginners, Gardening kit for home growers, Gardening Accessories for Pot farming, Grow-bag farming, Hanging gardens, Garden decors, fairy gardens, Potting-mix Soil Rejuvenation, Bio Fertilizers, Nurtients, Supplements, Seeds and Saplings. All other accessories and set-ups

Benefits of Joining Home Harvestors Group-

  1. Healthy and fresh vegetables.
  2. Off season and 24x7 availability for personal favorites.
  3. All Organic vegetables available amongst group members at reasonable prices.
  4. Additional source of income at convenience of home
